title: Factoring Rules
text: When we have an exponent to the power of something, we can multiply the two exponent terms.
speech: When we have an exponent to the power of something, we can multiply the two exponent terms.
pacedSpeech: When we have an exponent to the power of something, we can multiply the two exponent terms.

title: Simplifying Expression
text: If we factor the terms, what will our answer be?
speech: If we factor the terms, what will our answer be?
